channel.title: Class Platforms :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Besides this book, this class uses additional platforms for enrollment, assignments, and grading. Canvas LaunchCode monitors your progress in this class through a management system called Canvas. It provides a central location to manage the flow of information, but it does not hold the actual course content. Instead, it links to the lessons you need, and it keeps a record of your completed assignments and scores. Login to Canvas Access Canvas and the course materials at this link . To login, use your launchcode.org username and password, which are the same ones you used to apply for this class.
